connection.label: Connection String
connection.help: Connection String for the Oracle Server format - [host]:[port]/[sid or service name].

schema.label: User Schema
schema.help: (Optional) User Schema in the Oracle Database where data will be written into.

table.label: Table
table.help: Table name in the Oracle Database where data will be written into.

field_mapping.label: Field Mapping
field_mapping.help: List of the Table Fields/Columns. Input for this field is in JSON format {"(field_name)" : {"source_field" : "value", "data_type": "value", "format": "value"}}. field_name will be the name of the column in the Oracle Table, source_field (required) value will be the name of the field in the JSON Data passed to the plugin, data_type (optional) there are 6 available data types that will convert data to it's proper type before saving we have String, Integer, Float, Boolean, Timestamp and Date, format is only available for Timestamp and Date data_type allowing users to specify the format of the device date/time data value. Kindly refer to the MomentJS docs for more details (http://momentjs.com/docs/#/parsing/string-format/).
